title: Git Collaborative Version Control
description: In this challenge, you will learn how to merge a branch into the current branch, creating a merge commit, using the Git version control system.

meta.title: Mastering Git Collaborative Version Control
meta.description: Discover the power of Git's branch merging capabilities to streamline your collaborative software development workflow.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, branch, git, collaboration, git playground, merge

steps.title: Merge a Branch and Create a Merge Commit

verify.name: Verify that the merge was successful
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
